tool_description: Facebook scraping tool to crawl and extract data from Facebook Pages. Our fully updated FB scraper downloads posts, likes, comments, reviews, contact details, social media profiles, addresses, and all public data from Facebook Pages. Download data as JSON, CSV, Excel, XML, and more.
name: Facebook Pages Scraper
title: Facebook Pages Scraper

api_list.name: Crawl Facebook Posts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-pages-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com/posts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-pages-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
